pullRequest.title: DISTX-478-Enable Autoscaling History
pullRequest.bodyText:
Enable Autoscaling History Endpoint to retrieve Autoscaling Events
Capture history events for autoscaling.
Downscaling should not validate node count since downscaling to 0 nodes for a hostgroup is supported.

Closes #DISTX-478
Closes #DISTX-413
Closed #DISTX-501

nodes.bodyText: What is the reason for the inner class?
